narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Laboratory Corporation of America is a Clinical Medical Laboratory provider based in Houston, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $103.8M in Medicaid payments across 11.1M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $103.8M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 12,975 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
